Articles.Content:

Sorry for the crappy post, I'm new to forums. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T08:36:59Z" title="08/14/2015 08:36  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by mrw1**

That is an odd-looking plane. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) How does it fly? 

Oh, and welcome to the forum.
Welcome! It's... interesting. If you are willing to use more parts, I think it will look slightly better.
It flies better then the real plane i guess. and thnx ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
